select count(c.com_num) from Company c left join User u on c.com_num = u.com_num
where u.mg_auth = "2"

select c.*, u.mg_auth, u.user_regDate from Company c left join User u on c.com_num = u.com_num where c.com_name like concat('%',#{search_keyword},'%')
order by c.com_num desc
order by c.com_num asc
limit #{pageStart}, #{amount}
